stories.title: The State of Ukraine’s Nuclear Plants in the First Weeks of War
Interview: “A Case for Innovation and Optimism”

stories.text: There are many different types of recovery software in the world, and they seem to be able to recover different amount of data from hard disks. But when data is overwritten physically on disk, how is it possible some data recovery software can still recover data? Why are some of them better at recovering data than others?
stories.title: Ask HN: How is it possible that one data recovery software is better than other?

stories.text:
Amotions founder Pianpian had a fireside chat with former Microsoft general manager and certified leadership coach Jennifer on what makes a great leader, how to become a great leader, cultivating empathy and understanding, identifying strengths and weaknesses and passion, helping your team members grow, giving feedback, transitions from individual contributors to managers, cultivating an inclusive and diverse environment, challenges that introverts and women face, and how working moms can do well in both work and family. Happy international women's day!

Check out the full recording and more resources on Amotions: https://amotionsinc.com/. Amotions helps you and your team improve interpersonal relationships, effectiveness, and attract and retain talent, via content, practices, coaching, and AI insights developed by world-class experts.
stories.title: Amotions Chat with Certified Leadership Coach and Former Microsoft GM
